CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The full width at half - maximum ( fwhm ) of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) film is 324 nm , which is nearly a double that of P3HT film ( 158 nm ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) film |
| P3HT film |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) film |
| P3HT film |

Explanation: Both "PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) film" and "P3HT film" are materials mentioned in the paragraph, and they are the only entities that can be classified as material names with certainty.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The full width at half - maximum ( fwhm ) of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) film is 324 nm , which is nearly a double that of P3HT film ( 158 nm ).

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| full width at half - maximum (fwhm) |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) film |
| P3HT film |

The three property names identified in the paragraph are "full width at half - maximum (fwhm)", "PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) film", and "P3HT film". These entities are presented precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| full width at half - maximum (fwhm) |

After reviewing the entities identified in the previous answer, only "full width at half - maximum (fwhm)" clearly refers to a material property. The other two entities, "PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) film" and "P3HT film", are types of materials, not material properties. Therefore, only "full width at half - maximum (fwhm)" is presented in this answer.
